mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, SUM(us.gas_usage) AS gasUsageAmount FROM t_usage us JOIN t_user u ON u.user_cd = us.user_cd JOIN t_gas g ON us.gas_cd = g.gas_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id =#{user_id}) AND YEAR(gas_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(gas_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) GROUP BY u.user_cd;

SELECT u.user_id, SUM(us.elec_usage) AS elecUsageAmount FROM t_usage us JOIN t_user u ON u.user_cd = us.user_cd JOIN t_elec e ON us.gas_cd = e.elec_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id =#{user_id}) AND YEAR(elec_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(elec_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(gas_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(gas_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) GROUP BY u.user_cd;
